mapper.sql: id, type, type1, status, delete_flag, data_version, create_date, update_date
mapper.select: select pt.type,pt.id from poem_all.poem_type pt join (select `type`,min(id) id from poem_all.poem_type group by type) b on pt.type=b.type and pt.id=b.id order by id asc
SELECT id,type,type1 FROM poem.poem_type where type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status = 1 and delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY id

select
from poem_type where type = #{type1,jdbcType=INTEGER} and type1 is NULL and status = 1 and delete_flag = 0

select
from poem_type where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status = 1 and delete_flag = 0
mapper.insert: insert into poem_type (id, type, type1, status, delete_flag, data_version, create_date, update_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into poem_type
id,
type,

status,

create_date,
update_date,

mapper.update:
update poem_type
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type1 = #{type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
data_version = #{dataVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update poem_type set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type1 = #{type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_version = #{dataVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
